医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
抗精神病药物与疗养院行为问题增加有关滑铁卢大学研究人员进行的一项新研究分析了 2000 年至 2022 年间居住在加拿大各地疗养院的近 50 万名加拿大患者的数据。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241206/Antipsychotics-linked-to-increased-behavioral-problems-in-nursing-homes.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241206/Antipsychotics-linked-to-increased-behavioral-problems-in-nursing-homes.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=146be2ae-86c7-4226-8972-c5ee7cdb2d7c Fri, 06 Dec 2024 13:56:00 -0500 Antipsychotics linked to increased behavioral problems in nursing homes
SigRM 在单细胞表观转录组学分析方面取得突破研究人员开发了一种新工具，将帮助科学家研究基因如何在我们的细胞中表达。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241206/SigRM-offers-breakthrough-in-single-cell-epitranscriptomics-analysis.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241206/SigRM-offers-breakthrough-in-single-cell-epitranscriptomics-analysis.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=d14f8842-a2fb-49bf-87fa-a83794d38580 Fri, 06 Dec 2024 13:47:00 -0500 SigRM offers breakthrough in single-cell epitranscriptomics analysis
研究揭示围产期抑郁症女性的大脑结构差异研究人员发现，有围产期抑郁症病史的女性和没有围产期抑郁症病史的女性的大脑灰质结构存在差异。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241206/Study-reveals-brain-struct-differences-in-women-with-peripartum-depression.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241206/Study-reveals-brain-struct-differences-in-women-with-peripartum-depression.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=7d9b3ef3-e38e-4b19-ae89-75ad16ef8453 Fri, 06 Dec 2024 13:40:00 -0500 Study reveals brain structure differences in women with peripartum depression
p53 突变对胰腺癌代谢产生多种影响由毒理学家 Ivano Amelio 领导的康斯坦茨大学研究小组证明了肿瘤抑制因子 p53 的个体突变对胰腺癌的影响有何不同。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241206/p53-mutations-show-diverse-impact-on-pancreatic-cancer-metabolism.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241206/p53-mutations-show-diverse-impact-on-pancreatic-cancer-metabolism.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=883951ca-744f-46f8-a6b9-11ec59732500 Fri, 06 Dec 2024 13:32:00 -0500 p53 mutations show diverse impact on pancreatic cancer metabolism
新的合作旨在治愈 ALK 阳性肺癌肺癌是全球癌症死亡的主要原因，各种亚型每年影响数百万人。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241206/New-collaborative-effort-aims-to-cure-ALK-positive-lung-cancer.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241206/New-collaborative-effort-aims-to-cure-ALK-positive-lung-cancer.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=454de26d-4ff8-4dec-86cb-dd23a0fd0005 Fri, 06 Dec 2024 13:26:00 -0500 New collaborative effort aims to cure ALK-positive lung cancer
患有食物过敏的家庭对航空旅行的焦虑加剧西北大学食物过敏和哮喘研究中心 (CFAAR) 的一项新研究表明，天空对于受食物过敏影响的患者和家庭并不总是那么友好，他们可能经常对乘坐飞机旅行感到担忧和焦虑。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241206/Air-travel-anxiety-amplified-for-families-dealing-with-food-allergies.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241206/Air-travel-anxiety-amplified-for-families-dealing-with-food-allergies.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=45b71741-c0b9-4257-855a-440f61f5aadb Fri, 06 Dec 2024 13:18:00 -0500 Air travel anxiety amplified for families dealing with food allergies
新方法检测人体内未知的化学物质从 20 世纪 60 年代到 80 年代，燃料、油漆和管道中铅的使用造成了广泛的污染。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241206/New-method-detects-unrecognized-chemicals-in-the- human-body.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241206/New-method-detects-unrecognized-chemicals-in-the- human-body.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=51d4ce87-e503-4bf3-b876-9fa7fa076842 Fri, 06 Dec 2024 13:10:00 -0500 New method detects unrecognized chemicals in the human body
人工智能生成的交接记录：研究评估急诊医学的安全性和准确性研究人员开发并评估大型语言模型生成的急诊医学交接记录的准确性、安全性和实用性。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241206/AI- generated-handoff-notes-Study-asseses-safety-and-accuracy-in-emergency-medicine.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241206/AI- generated-handoff-notes-Study-asseses-safety-and-accuracy-in-emergency-medicine.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=0f2c08fc-5579-4170-9255-78e739a63468 Fri, 06 Dec 2024 13:07:00 -0500 AI-generated handoff notes: Study assesses safety and accuracy in emergency medicine
了解皮肤神经元如何处理社交触摸信号瑞典林雪平大学领导的一项新研究表明，皮肤中的两种神经元可能对于大脑如何解释人与人之间的社交接触特别重要。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241206/Understanding-how-the-skins-neurons-process-social-touch-signals.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241206/Understanding-how-the-skins-neurons-process-social-touch-signals.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=0ee2f061-f69f-4296-bc5c-8ff7011dedc1 Fri, 06 Dec 2024 13:03:00 -0500 Understanding how the skin's neurons process social touch signals
用珍珠串模型重新想象轴突在一项具有争议性的新研究中，科学家们挑战了神经科学中关于轴突形状的基本原则——从神经细胞辐射出的长而细的丝，在细胞之间传输电信号——并提出了一种新模型来理解信息如何在细胞中传递。大脑。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241206/Reimagining-axons-with-the-pearls-on-a-string-model.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241206/Reimagining-axons-with-the-pearls-on-a-string-model.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=8948d9e5-6311-4175-907f-9d84933d20e9 Fri, 06 Dec 2024 12:53:00 -0500 Reimagining axons with the pearls-on-a-string model
